CommandArgs: -v "http://localhost:8888/api/users/v1/login" -H "Pragma: no-cache" -H "Origin: http://localhost:8888" -H "Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br" -H "Accept-Language: de-DE,de;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7" -A "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/64.0.3282.186 Safari/537.36" -H "content-type: application/json" -H "Accept: */*" -H "Cache-Control: no-cache" -H "Referer: http://localhost:8888/login" -H "Connection: keep-alive" --data-binary "{"Email":"foobar@domain.tld","Password":"xxx"}"

-H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/44.0.2403.89 Safari/537.36" http://localhost:8888/questions/28760694/how-to-use-curl-to-get-a-get-request-exactly-same-as-using-chrome
